Explanation: Adjectivization of verbs via suffix -a / Relative particple (Asher & Kumari)
Ablative case / Locative case + postposition ninn˘
Allative case / Locative case + postposition ēkk˘
Gerund, Infinitive of Purpose (Moag) / Purposive Infinitive, Infinitive 2 (Asher & Kumari) (e.g. ceyyān)
Nominalization (for neuter, male, female or human nouns) (e.g. ceyyat˘)
